effect.Name: Division
effect.description: Division - Shader divides background and object colors with each other
effect.author: Foxioo

parameter.name: /* Foxioo Division (Background) Shader | 1.1 (23.06.2024) */
parameter.description: Shader divides background and object colors with each other

parameter.name: Blending Mode
parameter.description: This variable decides which color the divider should be. When the option is off, the divisor is the background colors and when the option is on, the divisor is the object colors

parameter.name: Mixing
parameter.description: This variable sets the intensity of background visibility
